Text: Even after all that, no \n one believes me. This is \n a cold, cold town, man.
Check this out!
Here we go again... Now \n he's put together fake \n pictures.
I know how he feels to \n be misunderstood.
I just wanted them to \n see the truth.
But... Never mind.
They're not fake! This \n girl took 'em from the \n other side for me.
Now you're using this \n poor girl in your \n stories too?
Young girl, you don't \n have to defend him.
Huh? No, he's telling \n the truth.
Wow, a whole other \n world? I wanna go see!
Now look what you've \n done. You've filled her \n head with nonsense.
That'd be great!
I had fun helping out! \n Let's do it again \n sometime.
And someday, everyone \n will know the truth.
I was right all these \n years! There is a world \n beyond the storm!
Well, at least I finally \n know the truth after all \n these years.
Everyone's goin' around \n thinkin' I'm crazy.

But I'm not. You'll 
 believe me, won't you? I 
 tell you, there's a 
 world beyond the storms.
I believe you! I've even \n seen it for myself.
Y-You have!? You \n actually came back from \n one?
Yep, how about you?
No, my pops did. \n It was a miracle \n he came back!
When he was on his \n deathbed, he told me \n about the other side.

I was so surprised, 
 I couldn't help 
 wanting to tell 
 everyone about it.
But no one wants to \n believe me about \n what I was told.
I've been tossin' stuff \n in the storms trying to \n prove my theory.
One day, I came up \n with the idea to toss \n in a radio.
And you know what came \n back? A weird noise.
I wonder if it ended up \n in a mining site?
Maybe one of the miners \n picked it up and \n responded?
Miners!? There are \n miners in the world \n beyond the storm?
Oh, right... The people \n in Hekseville don't know \n about ore mining.
I want to learn more \n about what's beyond the \n storm.
Could you lend me a hand \n investigatin'?
We want to learn what's \n really on the other side \n of that storm.

But... Are you sure 
 you're okay plunging 
 down into there like 
 that?
I'm a Gravity Shifter, \n I'll be fine!
I'm so glad I found you!
Here, take this radio.
I'll lower you down now.
Well, whaddaya see?
Hmm...
This looks like the \n gravel pit!
So Hekseville is \n connected to here by \n that storm!

You've been there 
 before? If it's safe, 
 would you mind lookin' 
 around?
What's there?
Well, nothing but \n gravity ore I guess.

What's that? 
 If you've got a camera, 
 could you grab a 
 picture?
There's a box.
Hm? Eww, it smells \n awful!
Hmm... I think that's \n the box of fruit I threw \n in a year ago.
You shouldn't just go \n dumping trash in here, \n this fruit's all rotten.
Hmm, this looks like a \n water tank.
I threw a water tank in \n about three years ago, \n maybe it's the same one!
I found one lyin' around \n and tossed it in.
This guy must've \n had a lot of time \n on his hands...
Ah! What's with \n this bed?
Oh, that must \n be my old bed.
I tossed it in, oh, must \n be about a decade ago.
A decade!? You've been \n throwing stuff in the \n storms that long?
He's been a bit off \n his rocker for some \n time now...
There's a drum.
That's the first thing I \n ever tossed in the \n storm.
Ahh, it takes me back to \n my younger days.
I hope he doesn't go \n tripping down memory \n lane on me...
A barricade!?

Have some real 
 unpleasant memories 
 about that one. Used to 
 always block my way.
So I tossed it in to get \n rid of it!
Hmm, I'll leave that \n memory alone.

There's a planter with 
 flowers! And they've 
 somehow managed to 
 survive!
What's that? \n Are the flowers \n blooming?
I threw that in \n not too long ago.
Though I just \n planted the seeds.
Time must flow \n differently there than \n here.

Yeah, it does. When I 
 came back to Hekseville, 
 time really passed on 
 me.

Hmm, come to think of 
 it, shouldn't we be 
 experiencing a time 
 shift over the radio?
Good point! There \n must be some strange \n forces at work.
I got a picture!
Great! Could you also \n bring some of that ore \n stuff back with you?
I guess if I mined it a \n bit, I could take some \n back.
All done!
Is there still ore down \n there?
Yeah, lots.
Well, why not grab some \n more while you're there?
I've got a ton of ore, \n this should be enough.
Thanks! Say, what's it \n look like down there?
Are there any landmarks?
Hmm... Well, I guess the \n fighting arena.
Fighting arena? \n Could you check \n it out for me?

I'd love a picture. 
 Make sure to 
 grab the whole 
 thing.
I got the picture of the \n fighting arena!
Thanks! Is there \n anything else around \n that stands out?
Hmm... Not really, just \n a few floating islands.
Huh? \n What's that?
What's wrong?
There's black smoke \n coming from the next \n island over.
Check it out for me!
Is this a water tank?
I threw a water tank in \n about three years ago, \n maybe it's the same one!
There's some black \n smoke coming off of it.
And it smells funny...
Uh-oh...
It's coming from what \n looks like a water tank.
And it smells funny...
Hm? What could it be?
Wai- what!?
The smoke's gone, but \n that smell's still here.

Hmm, I think I put 
 something in that tank 
 before tossin' it 
 over...
What could it have been?
Aww, I wonder what's in \n there. It's gonna drive \n me crazy not knowing.
Hey, could you grab a \n picture of the whole \n island for me?
Make sure that tank I \n threw in makes it in the \n shot!

Sure, I'll take a shot 
 from up above to 
 make sure I get 
 the tank.
I grabbed a picture! \n On to the next island?
Hold on.

Could you look around to 
 see if any other junk 
 I threw in the storm is 
 lyin' around?
There should be more \n than that water tank \n down there.
Other junk, huh...
Huh!? There's a Nevi \n sleeping in this bed!
Why would a Nevi need a \n bed? It sure seems to \n like it...
That must be the bed I \n threw down there!
A Nevi in my old bed, \n imagine! What I wouldn't \n give to see that...
Would you mind takin' a \n picture? Be careful not \n to wake it up.
Huh!? There's a Nevi \n sleeping in this bed!
Why would a Nevi need a \n bed? It sure seems to \n like it...
A Nevi in my old bed, \n imagine! What I wouldn't \n give to see that...
Would you mind takin' a \n picture? Be careful not \n to wake it up.
I got a great picture \n for you!
Thanks! I can't wait to \n see it.
Hey, I'm picking up a \n weird signal from the \n old radio I tossed in.
I think it must \n be close.

Your radio is designed 
 to pick up signals like 
 the one from the old 
 radio's transmitter.
If you use the sensor, \n you should be able \n to find the old radio.
Okay, I'll have a look \n around here.
What's this?
H-Hold on...
I just received a \n strange signal from the \n old radio I tossed in.
You should go \n check it out!
There's a wave finder in \n the radio I gave you.
Use it to find the old \n radio and bring it back.
An old radio, got it!
The sensor is reacting, \n it's close now! Hm?
What is it?
I'm pickin' up something \n real strange.
Bzzz... Bzz...
I hear it too, \n what is it?
Not sure, just be \n careful.
Ah!
There are Nevi here!
Are you gonna \n be okay!?
I'll be fine. I'm used \n to dealing with 'em.
I took care of 'em, \n they just caught \n me by surprise.
I'm glad you're okay!
I'll bet those Nevi mean \n the old radio is close.
Okay, I'll look \n around here.
I found the old radio!
I can tell. Your voice \n is comin' from two \n places.

You've gathered a wealth 
 of information. We can 
 call the investigation 
 quits for now.
If you get back to the \n cage, I'll bring you up.
Okay, I'll head \n back now.
Take a Picture of \n Some Gravity Ore
Shoot!
Take a Picture of the \n Gravity Ore Mines
Hmm, not such a great picture.
Mine Ore
Collect 50 Gems
Gems Collected
Ah, the old Banga mining site.
Explorer: \n How you doin'?
Doing good so far.
I still need a lot more...
I hope everyone back in Banga is okay.
Just a little more should do it.
There's the fighting arena.
Head to the Fighting Arena
Okay, I'm here.
Here it is.
Take a Picture of the \n Fighting Arena
I need to get the fighting arena in the picture.
I need to capture more of the arena.
Investigate the Smoke
I've got to take down the Nevi and investigate the smoke.
Defeat the Nevi
Nevi are coming from the smoke!
Take a Picture of the Island \n with the Water Tank
I need a picture of that island.
I need to make sure the island is in the picture.
I need the whole island in the picture.
Find the "Other Junk"
Hmm, I wonder...
Huh?
Take a Picture of the \n Nevi on the Bed
I should use the camera's zoom to avoid waking it.
I need to grab that picture.
Shoot, I woke it up!
I need to take the picture from further back.
I need the bed in the picture.
I need to zoom in a little more.
I need the bed in the picture.
Nothing's different about it.
I should get in a little closer.
It's the old radio!
Time to head back.
I've got to take out the Nevi!
Nevi!
Defeat the Nevi
More of them!
Find the Old Radio
Explorer: \n I think you're getting further away from the old radio.
I'm getting a response!
It must be that way!
I should go check it out!
Sensor Response
I need to continue the survey.
